malp.Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • malp.Entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arrow, Player, Skull

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The Entity class, representing a living object that the GameEngine handles.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean alive
      The active state of the entity, used internally and by the GameEngine to determine entity behaviour and clean up unused entities.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Animation animation
      The Animation rendered on-screen by the draw() method.
      protected double x
      The x coordinate.
      protected double y
      The y coordinate.
